Package com.intellij.psi

Class PsiElementFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.psi.PsiElementFinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroovyClassFinder, MigrationElementFinder, NonClasspathClassFinder, PackagePrefixElementFinder, PsiElementFinderImpl

    public abstract class PsiElementFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to extend the mechanism of locating classes and packages by full-qualified name. Implementations of this interface need to be registered as extensions in order to be picked up by JavaPsiFacade.

    • Method Detail

      • findClass

        public abstract PsiClass findClass(java.lang.String qualifiedName,
                                   GlobalSearchScope scope)
        Searches the specified scope within the project for a class with the specified full-qualified name and returns one if it is found.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the full-qualified name of the class to find.
        scope - the scope to search.
        Returns:
        the PSI class, or null if no class with such name is found.
        See Also:
        JavaPsiFacade.findClass(String, GlobalSearchScope)

      • findClasses

        public abstract PsiClass [] findClasses(java.lang.String qualifiedName,
                                        GlobalSearchScope scope)
        Searches the specified scope within the project for classes with the specified full-qualified name and returns all found classes.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the full-qualified name of the class to find.
        scope - the scope to search.
        Returns:
        the array of found classes, or an empty array if no classes are found.
        See Also:
        JavaPsiFacade.findClasses(String, GlobalSearchScope)

      • findPackage

        public PsiPackage findPackage(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Searches the project for the package with the specified full-qualified name and returns one if it is found.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the full-qualified name of the package to find.
        Returns:
        the PSI package, or null if no package with such name is found.
        See Also:
        JavaPsiFacade.findPackage(String)

      • getClassesFilter

        public Condition<PsiClass> getClassesFilter(GlobalSearchScope scope)
        Returns the filter to exclude classes, for example derived classes.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope in which classes are searched.
        Returns:
        the filter to use, or null if no additional filtering is necessary

      • getPackageFiles

        public PsiFile [] getPackageFiles(PsiPackage psiPackage,
                                  GlobalSearchScope scope)
        Returns a list of files belonging to the specified package which are not located in any of the package directories.
        Parameters:
        psiPackage - the package to return the list of files for.
        scope - the scope in which files are searched.
        Returns:
        the list of files.

      • getPackageFilesFilter

        public Condition<PsiFile> getPackageFilesFilter(PsiPackage psiPackage,
                                                GlobalSearchScope scope)
        Returns the filter to use for filtering the list of files in the directories belonging to a package to exclude files that actually belong to a different package. (For example, in Kotlin the package of a file is determined by its package statement and not by its location in the directory structure, so the files which have a differring package statement need to be excluded.)
        Parameters:
        psiPackage - the package for which the list of files is requested.
        scope - the scope in which children are requested.
        Returns:
        the filter to use, or null if no additional filtering is necessary.

      • getClassNames

                                                     GlobalSearchScope scope)
        A method to optimize resolve (to only search classes in a package which might be there)
